results.title: Parties Identified
results.rationale: Legal names of both parties are explicitly stated.

citations.quote: THIS AGREEMENT is entered into between Alpha Corp and Beta LLC. Effective Date: January 1, 2024. Term and Termination: This Agreement shall continue for one year unless terminated by either party with 30 days notice. Payment Terms: Beta LLC shall pay Alpha Corp $10,000 per year. Confidentiality: Each party agrees to maintain confidentiality. Limitation of Liability: Liability is limited to fees paid under this Agreement. Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of California.
